import React from 'react'; import SubscriptionCard from '../components/SubscriptionCard'; const Subscribe = () => { const monthlyFeatures = [ "Ability to choose the body parts you want to work on and get Pulse to create your workout.", "Tap into our vibrant fitness community and inspire others with your workout videos.", "See the history of your workouts to keep track of weight and progress on each lift." ]; const yearlyFeatures = [ "Ability to choose the body parts you want to work on and get Pulse to create your workout.", "Tap into our vibrant fitness community and inspire others with your workout videos.", "See the history of your workouts to keep track of weight and progress on each lift." ]; return (
{/* Title Section */}
Become a member of the collective
The first month is on us!
{/* Subscription Cards */}
{/* App Features Section */}
{/* Feature Image Placeholder */}
{/* Title & Description */}
App features to promote
Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum
{/* First Feature */}
Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum
Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem
{/* Second Feature */}
Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum
Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem
); }; export default Subscribe;
